title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, embed, pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with chat history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for QA and generation pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama; chat, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.
